T02D3772:174b-1: tsa t'u r'a dza ma h'a ba lim n'a ma /
T02D3772:174b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma zhes bya ba /
T02D3772:174b-4: lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3772:174b-5: yon tan rgyud la skye ba yi //
T02D3772:174b-6: bar chad sel ba'i gtor ma'i mchog / rgyal chen bzhi yi gtor ma brtsam //
T02D3772:174b-7: de nas sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga tshad med pa bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la /
T02D3772:174b-8: gtor ma khyad par du bya ba bzang du bshams pa la /
T02D3772:174b-9: de nas rang khyad par du bya ba yi dam gyi lhar bsgoms la /
T02D3772:174b-10: sku gsung thugs yi ges byin gyis brlab /
T02D3772:174b-11: gtor ma sva bh'a ba'i sngags kyis stong bar bsgoms la /
T02D3772:174b-12: stong pa'i ngang las lam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D3772:175a-0: de'i steng du ram las me'i @175a * //
T02D3772:175a-2: aa las thod pa'i phor pa /
T02D3772:175a-3: de'i nang du aa zhu ba las bdud rtsi /
T02D3772:175a-4: de nas khru gang tsam na aa las zla ba'i
T02D3772:175a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um dkar po yongs su
T02D3772:175a-6: gyur pa las rdo rjed kar po rtse lda pa
T02D3772:175a-7: khong gseng can de'i steng na /
T02D3772:175a-8: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su t'am ljang gu las 'od zer thur la 'phros /
T02D3772:175a-9: bdud rtsir zhu yar 'phros sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D3772:175a-10: sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtse
T02D3772:175a-11: char rgan po tsam bab par bsams la aa k'a
T02D3772:175a-12: ro'i sngags lnga'am bdun brjod aa:h'um yang lnga'am bdun brjod
T02D3772:175a-13: / de ni gtor ma khyad par du bya ba'o //
T02D3772:175a-14: de nas mgron khyad par du bya ba ni mdun
T02D3772:175a-15: gyi nam mkha' la pam las padma'i gdan 'dab ma
T02D3772:175a-16: bzhi pa / lte ba la aa las zla ba'i
T02D3772:175a-17: dkyil 'khor de'i steng du t'am yig ljang gu las
T02D3772:175a-18: 'od spro bsdu byas pas autpa la t'am gyis mtshan
T02D3772:175a-19: bzhi pa / pa / de las 'do 'phros tshur
T02D3772:175a-20: 'dus pas rje btsun ma sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag
T02D3772:175a-21: bzhi pa / pa / gnyis pa / sku mdo ga ljang gu g-yas skyabs sbyin /
T02D3772:175a-22: g-yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i autpal 'dzin pa bsam /
T02D3772:175a-23: de nas ye shes pa spyan drangs la dza:h'um bam ho:sa bstim /
T02D3772:175a-24: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ges byin gyis brlab /
T02D3772:175a-25: de nas shar gyi padma la rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3772:175a-27: lho'i padma la rgyal po 'phags skyes po sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis /
T02D3772:175a-28: nub kyi padma la rgyal po mig mi bzang sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3772:175a-29: byang gi padma la rgyal po rnam thos sras sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3772:175a-30: de bzhi skad cig la wal gyis bskyed la /
T02D3772:175a-31: de nas snying gnas 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
T02D3772:175a-32: sku gsung thugs kyi yi ges byin gyis brlab /
T02D3772:175a-33: de nas de bzhi'i ljags mi dmigs pa las yi ge h'um re yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3772:175a-34: lce stod rdo rje lce smad sbu gu can gyis
T02D3772:175a-35: gtor ma la tar gyis btsugs nas gsol bar bsams
T02D3772:175a-36: la / ba lim ta kh'a hi zhes la na gsum bstab po//
T02D3772:175a-37: de nas bka' bsgo ba ni shar phyogs dri za'i gdon dang /
T02D3772:175a-38: lho phyogs gshen rje'i gdon dang /
T02D3772:175a-39: nub phyogs grul bum gyi gdon dang /
T02D3772:175a-40: byang phyogs gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /
T02D3772:175a-41: gdon chen po bco brgyad dang /
T02D3772:175a-42: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la sogs pa la bsrung du gsol zhes gsol pa gdab po //
T02D3772:175b-0: de nas ye shes @175b sems dpa' gshegs /
T02D3772:175b-1: dam tshig sems dpa' me dmigs par bsam /
T02D3772:175b-2: gtor ma sa gtsang sar bskyal /
T02D3772:175b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma rdzogs so /
T02D3772:175b-5: // / pandi ta d'ipam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
